p: G.Y. and X.X. contributed equally to this work as well as performed most of the experiments. N.M., G.Y. and P.S. designed the experiments, S.A., H.G. generated the humanized mice, N.O. performed molecular cloning experiments. SÂ·P performed the Western blot experiment and edited the manuscript. G.Y., N.M. and P.S. interpreted the data and wrote the manuscript.
